bibl.title: Women and the Comic Plot in Menander.
bibl.note: Based on a Ph.D. - 1. Those obscure objects of desire. - 2. Misperception of status. - 3. Misperception of character. - 4. Informing the audience. - 5. The women of the Epitrepontes. - 6. Why women? - Indices.
bibl.seg: TRAILL Ariana, Women and the Comic Plot in Menander.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2008, 8°, x-301 pp. ISBN 978-0-521-88226-2. £57.

Based on a Ph.D. - 1. Those obscure objects of desire. - 2. Misperception of status. - 3. Misperception of character. - 4. Informing the audience. - 5. The women of the Epitrepontes. - 6. Why women? - Indices.
C.R. par Horst-Dieter Blume, Gnomon 82 (2010) pp. 302-307. - Sebastiana Nervegna, CR N.S., 60 (2010) pp. 54-56. - Vincent J. Rosivach, CW 103 (2009-2010) pp. 274-275.
